text: Chris Conrad is an American actor. He is best known for his roles as Jason in Young Hercules and Dennis McClaren in Patriot. ==Career== Conrad spent a year studying at the Piven Theatre Workshop, then signed with an agent and moved to Los Angeles with his brother Steven who was in the process of selling the script for Wrestling Ernest Hemingway. His early movie roles were in Airborne and The Next Karate Kid. His breakout television role was in the 1998 series Young Hercules, in which he appeared in 37 episodes as Young Jason. In 2000 Conrad returned home to Florida to finish college, he graduated from Florida Atlantic with a bachelor's degree in history. He then taught high school and coached football but returned to Los Angeles in 2005 to further pursue acting. He returned to television with one-time appearances in Bones and Criminal Minds. Chris appears in Steven Conrad's productions including Patriot and Perpetual Grace, LTD. ==Personal life== In his free time, Conrad trains in kickboxing, wrestling, and Jiu-Jitsu, he holds a purple belt in Machado Jiu- Jitsu. ==Filmography== ===Film=== {| class="wikitable sortable" !
